about_the_game:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2558520/Slay_the_Dragon_The_FireBreathing_Tyrant_Meets_Her_Match/

A linear mini visual novel that takes place in a monster girl brothel set in the same universe as "Sylvie's Bar."

You play the role of a nameless, overworked man who's come to town just in time for the "Fruits of the Forest" special. The time of your life awaits you with any of the lovely monster girls of the garden-grown variety, who will make you forget all about your worries and fretting.

However, you quickly find that you're too late, and the girls have all gone home for the night. But, the owner seems to have taken pity on you, and maybe things will work out for you, in the end.

Welcome to "Seeds of Paradise." We hope you enjoy your stay.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains a scene of dubious sexual consent between the dominating heroine and the main character.

detailed_description:

A linear mini visual novel that takes place in a monster girl brothel set in the same universe as "Sylvie's Bar."

You play the role of a nameless, overworked man who's come to town just in time for the "Fruits of the Forest" special. The time of your life awaits you with any of the lovely monster girls of the garden-grown variety, who will make you forget all about your worries and fretting.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Pentium 4 - 1.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Display 1280x720
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 11
  • Processor: Intel i3 2.0 Ghz
  • Graphics: Display 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Seeds of Paradise

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP and Up
  • Processor: Pentium III 800 MHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard Graphics (1280x720)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible

short_description: A mini side story set in the same universe as "Sylvie's Bar" featuring a different flavor of monster girl brothels. You play an overworked man who's all but run out of luck, but the sadistic strawberry girl who keeps the business running may just take pity on you, yet.
